mapper.select: select nots.branch,branchs.branch_name as branchName,jan_new as jan,jans.janname as janName,'' as errMsg from planocycle.priority_order_commodity_not nots left join masterdb.jans jans on nots.jan_new = jans.jan left join masterdb.branchs branchs on nots.branch = branchs.branch_cd and branchs.company_cd = nots.company_cd where nots.company_cd = #{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select branch_cd from masterdb.branchs where company_cd =#{companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
mapper.insert:
insert into planocycle.priority_order_commodity_not (company_cd, priority_order_cd, branch, jan_new) values
(#{list.companyCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.priorityOrderCd,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{list.branch,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{list.jan,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
